attributes.action: Equity & Equality for school, college & University workers
attributes.additional_details:
The right of school, college & university students to be recognised as full & part time workers & to get paid commensurate with the work they do.
To guarantee their rights to equity & equality commensurate with the work they do as a way to enfranchise the school, college & university student workers.
Prohibiting the academic truck system of virtual child slave labour, indentured labour & debt bondage which are all outlawed by current law.
